roleset.name: make glamorous

example.name: just transitive
example.text: [Mr. Lane]-1 's final purpose is n't *trace*-1 to glamorize the Artist 's vagabond existence .

example.name: with adornment
example.text: In the Babylonian Bronx , Jewish working - class people lived in [drab , Soviet - style buildings]-1 `` glamorized '' *trace*-1 with names like AnaMor Towers ( after owners Anna and Morris Snezak ) , whose lobbies and hallways were decorated with murals of ancient Syrians and Greeks , friezes of Pompeii .
example.arg: with names like AnaMor Towers (after owners Anna and Morris Snezak)

roleset.note: GLAMORIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'glamorize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from glamorize.01-v predicate notes)
